title: Government revenue and spending in Greece 2024
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Revenue, and Spending. The y axis represents Revenue / spending in billion euros and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Revenue, and Spending are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Spending, and lastly, 2. Revenue.
Overall across the Year, Spending mostly maintained the highest Revenue / spending in billion euros when compared to others with a mean value of 92.11, and it peaked at 2024.
Revenue mostly had the least Revenue / spending in billion euros with a mean value of 90.18, which peaked at 2024 with a value of 96.93.
